title: Colin Cowherd’s Instant Reaction - Cowboys/Eagles SNF, Bills/Chiefs Showdown
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd’s Instant Reaction - Cowboys/Eagles SNF, Bills/Chiefs Showdown
description:
Colin gives his instant reaction to the Eagles staying undefeated with a SNF home win over the Cowboys, and if Dallas is a Wild Card team. He also discusses the Bills gutting out a tough road win over the Chiefs, and if any other NFL starters are in Mahomes and Allen’s class.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
